Text: WARNING!! This is Russian installer!! How do you change installer and game to English?

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Spec-Ops-The-Line.html

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP SP3
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 equivalent
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Hard Disk Space: 6 GB free
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7900 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB memory)
DirectX速: 9.0
Sound: DirectX Compatible
Confirmed,  Russian.  I cant find any way to change that.

Go into ur game folder (Spec Ops. The Line), then into Binaries, then Win32. Open SKIDROW.ini with notepad and change Language = russian to Language = english. Now ur game is in English.
Thanks for this one uploader, much appreciated.
Yeah well that doesnt work in W7, you are not allowed to save or modify the document, or create a new one and replace it.
OK I got it, you need to turn off User Account Control and it will save the changes.
how to put the game in english??? hepl!!
how to put the game in english??? hepl!!
how to put the game in english?? help!!

THANKS HEROMASTER FOR THE UPLOAD GAME WORKS PROPERLY BUT SETUP IS IN RUSSIAN AND GAME STARTS IN RUSSIAN FOR FIRST TIME, TO CHANGE IT I FOLLOWED POPPACHUBBIE'S COMMENT GAME IS PROPER IN ENGLISH NOW TO CHANGE Go into ur game folder (Spec Ops. The Line), then into Binaries, then Win32. Open SKIDROW.ini with notepad and change Language = russian to Language = english. Now ur game is in English. ENJOY THE GAME :)

To the ones who didnt succeed at changing the language  : 
You need to left click on skydrow.ini, go in security, and allow to you (Users) to modify the thing, as simple as that :)
